name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-1
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return iterations of XZ version 5.6.0 via aws ssm.

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-critical-assets-1
description: This query will use ssm inventories to notify on potentially affected critical assets that have vulnerable XZ version 5.6.0 installed

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND #CriticalAsset THAT HAS >> aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= 'xz-utils_5.6.0'

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-network-devices-1
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return potentially affected network devices with vulnerable XZ version 5.6.0 installed

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND Internet THAT RELATES TO aws_security_group AS sg THAT RELATES TO aws_instance AS i THAT HAS >> aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= 'xz-utils_5.6.0' RETURN i.displayName AS 'EC2', sg.displayName AS 'Security Group'

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-2
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return iterations of XZ version 5.6.1 via aws ssm.

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-critical-assets-2
description: This query will use ssm inventories to notify on potentially affected critical assets that have vulnerable XZ version 5.6.1 installed

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND #CriticalAsset THAT HAS >> aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= 'xz-utils_5.6.1'

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-network-devices-2
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return potentially affected network devices with vulnerable XZ version 5.6.1 installed

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND Internet THAT RELATES TO aws_security_group AS sg THAT RELATES TO aws_instance AS i THAT HAS >> aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= 'xz-utils_5.6.1' RETURN i.displayName AS 'EC2', sg.displayName AS 'Security Group'

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-devices
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return potentially affected devices with vulnerable XZ version installed

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND (Host|Device) THAT RELATES TO aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= ('xz-utils_5.6.0' OR 'xz-utils_5.6.1')

name: execution-command-and-scripting-unix-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-general
description: This query will use ssm inventories to return all installed versions of XZ in your environment

name: execution-command-and-scripting-malicious-binary
description: Identify which hosts/endpoints are using CodeRepos with Log4j dependencies.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND * THAT RELATES TO Host THAT DEPLOYED CodeRepo THAT USES CodeModule WITH displayName = 'log4j'

name: execution-cloud-administration-command-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-openssh-device-1
description: Identify which hosts/endpoints are using vulnerable versions of openssh.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND (Host | Device) THAT RELATES TO aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= ('openssh-1' OR 'openssh-2' OR 'openssh-3' OR 'openssh-4.1' OR 'openssh-4.2' OR 'openssh-4.3')

name: execution-cloud-administration-command-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-openssh-device-2
description: Identify which hosts/endpoints are using vulnerable versions of openssh.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND (Host | Device) THAT RELATES TO aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= ('openssh-8.5' OR 'openssh-8.6' OR 'openssh-8.6' OR 'openssh-8.8' OR 'openssh-8.9' OR 'openssh-9.1' OR 'openssh-9.2' OR 'openssh-9.3' OR 'openssh-9.4' OR 'openssh-9.5' OR 'openssh-9.6' OR 'openssh-9.7')

name: execution-cloud-administration-command-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-openssh-general-1
description: Identify ssm inventories that contain vulnerable versions of openssh.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= ('openssh-1' OR 'openssh-2' OR 'openssh-3' OR 'openssh-4.1' OR 'openssh-4.2' OR 'openssh-4.3')

name: execution-cloud-administration-command-aws-ssm-malicious-binary-openssh-general-2
description: Identify ssm inventories that contain vulnerable versions of openssh.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND aws_instance_inventory WITH applicationInventory ~= ('openssh-8.5' OR 'openssh-8.6' OR 'openssh-8.6' OR 'openssh-8.8' OR 'openssh-8.9' OR 'openssh-9.1' OR 'openssh-9.2' OR 'openssh-9.3' OR 'openssh-9.4' OR 'openssh-9.5' OR 'openssh-9.6' OR 'openssh-9.7')
